Package org.hkijena.acaq5.api.algorithm

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ACAQAlgorithmDeclaration
    Describes an ACAQGraphNode
    ACAQParallelizedAlgorithm
    Algorithm that supports parallelization
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ACAQAlgorithm
    An ACAQGraphNode that contains a non-empty workload.
    ACAQAlgorithm.StateSerializer
    Serializer used by getStateId() It automatically skips name, compartment, description, slot configuration, and UI parameters that are not relevant to the state
    ACAQAlgorithmGraph
    Manages multiple ACAQGraphNode instances as graph
    ACAQAlgorithmGraph.Deserializer
    Deserializes an ACAQAlgorithmGraph
    ACAQAlgorithmGraph.Serializer
    Serializes an ACAQAlgorithmGraph
    ACAQAlgorithmGraphEdge
    A custom graph edge
    ACAQDataInterface
    Wraps a set of input and output slots that belong together This can be used for convenience
    ACAQDataSetKey
    Structure that can hold multiple ACAQAnnotation instances to make a set of traits a key
    ACAQEmptyAlgorithmDeclaration
    An empty algorithm declaration.
    ACAQEmptyAlgorithmDeclaration.Serializer
    Serializes the empty algorithm declaration
    ACAQGraphNode
    An algorithm is is a set of input and output data slots, and a run() function It is part of the ACAQAlgorithmGraph.
    ACAQGraphNode.Serializer
    Serializes an ACAQGraphNode instance
    ACAQIOSlotConfiguration
    Slot configuration that always ensures 1:1 relation between input and output slots
    ACAQIteratingAlgorithm
    An ACAQAlgorithm that iterates through each data row.
    ACAQJavaAlgorithmDeclaration
    ACAQAlgorithmDeclaration for an algorithm that is defined in Java code All necessary properties are extracted from class attributes
    ACAQJavaAlgorithmDeclaration.Serializer
    Serializes the declaration
    ACAQMergingAlgorithm
    An ACAQAlgorithm that applies a similar algorithm to ACAQIteratingAlgorithm, but does create ACAQMultiDataInterface instead.
    ACAQMultiDataInterface
    Wraps a set of input and output slots that belong together.
    ACAQMutableAlgorithmDeclaration
    Instantiates ACAQGraphNode instances
    ACAQSimpleIteratingAlgorithm
    An ACAQAlgorithm that iterates through each data row.
    DefaultAlgorithmInputSlot
    Default implementation of AlgorithmInputSlot
    DefaultAlgorithmOutputSlot
    Default implementation of AlgorithmOutputSlot
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ACAQAlgorithmCategory
    Available algorithm categories
    ACAQIteratingAlgorithm.ColumnMatching
    Strategies that determine how to detect the columns that should be used for matching
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    AlgorithmInputSlot
    Annotates an ACAQGraphNode with an input slot.
    AlgorithmInputSlots
    Required to allow multiple AlgorithmInputSlot
    AlgorithmOutputSlot
    Annotates an ACAQGraphNode with an output slot.
    AlgorithmOutputSlots
    Required to allow multiple AlgorithmOutputSlot
